WhatIDo.techExpertise: My tech expertise are as follows:

descriptionArr: Developing responsive single page web applications front end using React.js, Next.js, Redux.js, Angular, TailwindCSS, Material-UI,  HTML/CSS and Bootstrap.
Creating secure and fast backends for application utilizing Node.js and Express.js
Interacting with the databases like MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL using ODMs/ORMs like Mongoose, Sequelize and Prisma respectively.
Utilizing TypeScript for its powerful features like static typing etc to develop both front-end and back-end applications with enhanced code quality, maintainability, and scalability.
Developing and consuming RESTful APIs, employing modern programming practices to ensure integration.

certificates.name: Advance Web Development
description: - Completed an in-depth Front-End Web Development course.
- Covered HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
- Built responsive UIs and interactive features.
- Gained hands-on experience through multiple real-world projects.

certificates.name: Full Stack Web Development
description: - Full Stack development training using the MERN stack.
- Built complete web applications with CRUD functionality.
- Implemented REST APIs, authentication, and routing.
- Deployed projects using Git and version control best practices.

certificates.name: AWS Cloud Computing
description: - Covered core AWS services including EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS.
- Hands-on labs in cloud infrastructure, deployment, and monitoring.
- Implemented real-time scaling and automation using AWS tools.
- Focused on cost-effective, secure, and scalable architectures.

certificates.name: MERN Stack Developer Internship
description: - Completed a 2-month internship as a MERN Stack Developer.
- Built and maintained scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
- Collaborated in a remote team using Git, Trello, and Agile methodology.
- Focused on performance optimization, reusable component design, and API integration.

certificates.name: CPA: Programming Essentials in C++
description: - Completed Programming Essentials in C++ certification.
- Gained understanding of C++ syntax, OOP, memory handling, and algorithms.
- Developed console-based applications and problem-solving skills.
- Credential jointly issued by Cisco Networking Academy and the C++ Institute.

certificates.name: Basic Training Program - Web Development
description: - Completed a 1-year structured training program in web development.
- Covered core web technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and responsive design.
- Gained exposure to real-time collaboration and Agile-based workflow.
- Worked on internal tools and participated in code reviews and debugging sessions.
- Applied Git, GitHub, and version control in daily practice.
- Built mini-projects and contributed to in-house development tasks.

certificates.name: MERN Stack Bootcamp
description: - Successfully completed a 3-month intensive MERN stack bootcamp.
- Gained hands-on experience with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
- Developed full-stack projects with authentication, routing, and CRUD features.
- Attended live sessions, weekly challenges, and real-world assignments.
- Collaborated in groups using Git, GitHub Projects, and peer code reviews.
- Built a capstone project integrating full-stack concepts in a production-like environment.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.subtitle: Work, Internship and Volunteership
Experience.description: I'm a passionate software engineer who loves crafting creative solutions with code. My main area of expertise revolves around building scalable applications using the MERN stack. Additionally, I have a strong enthusiasm for fostering tech communities and actively engage in various tech events. Guiding and supporting aspiring developers as they begin their career paths brings me immense joy because we all know the struggle of finding the missing semicolon.
